alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 4:01AM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow is expected, with storm total snow accumulations ranging from 2 to 6 inches. The higher accumulations will occur at the southeastern portion of each county. * WHERE...Estill, Wolfe and Lee Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will gradually taper off by early this morning, before increasing in intensity once again by this afternoon. The snow will continue through tonight, before ending by early Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.
